OOC: He will be an interesting character.  Damnit, he will!

::Whistler::
       He awoke from his long, long, sleep to find himself in the middle of 
the Maximal City.  Of course he was very, very, lost.  When he had collapsed 
there had been a base there.  Now there was a city.  He slowly stood up and 
found he now had a hunched back and a limp.  He began wandering aimlessly 
around the city.  He decided to open a com to anyone in the vicinity.  
"Hello.  This is Whistler.  I'm a little lost.  There seems to have been a 
city built around my unconscious body.  If anyone could help, I'd be much 
obliged."

--part1_dd.17c65bb1.288e041e_boundary
Content-Type: text/html; charset="US-ASCII"
